LanguageData.VFE_Pottery.label: гончарство
LanguageData.VFE_Pottery.description: A small-size pieces of pottery with artisting engravings. Can be crafted on a crafting spot.
LanguageData.VFE_Pottery_Blueprint_Install.label: pottery (blueprint)
LanguageData.VFE_StatueSmall.label: мала статуя
LanguageData.VFE_StatueSmall.description: A small-size piece of material on a decorative pedestal, sculpted into an artistic form.
LanguageData.VFE_StatueSmall_Blueprint_Install.label: small statue (blueprint)
LanguageData.VFE_Carving.label: різьблення
LanguageData.VFE_Carving.description: A small carving sculpted from a waist-tall wall piece. Can act as cover.
LanguageData.VFE_Carving_Blueprint_Install.label: carving (blueprint)
LanguageData.VFE_StatueLarge.label: велика статуя
LanguageData.VFE_StatueLarge.description: A person-sized piece of material on a decorative pedestal, sculpted into an artistic form.
LanguageData.VFE_StatueLarge_Blueprint_Install.label: large statue (blueprint)
LanguageData.VFE_StatueGrand.label: велична статуя
LanguageData.VFE_StatueGrand.description: A huge piece of material on a decorative pedestal, sculpted into an artistic form.
LanguageData.VFE_StatueGrand_Blueprint_Install.label: grand statue (blueprint)
LanguageData.VFE_Monument.label: монумент
LanguageData.VFE_Monument.description: An impassable, massive monument with an ornate pedestal and a large art piece.
LanguageData.VFE_Monument_Blueprint_Install.label: monument (blueprint)
LanguageData.VFE_Relief.label: рельєф
LanguageData.VFE_Relief.description: An impassable, long piece of wall with an artistic relief carved into it.
LanguageData.VFE_Relief_Blueprint_Install.label: relief (blueprint)
LanguageData.VFE_Pillar.label: колона
LanguageData.VFE_Pillar.description: An impassable, decorated pillar capable of supporting a roof.
LanguageData.VFE_Pillar_Blueprint_Install.label: pillar (blueprint)
LanguageData.VFE_Obelisk.label: обеліск
LanguageData.VFE_Obelisk.description: A tall piece of material shaped into an obelisk with an art piece carved into the sides.
LanguageData.VFE_Obelisk_Blueprint_Install.label: obelisk (blueprint)
LanguageData.VFE_Plinth.label: підставка
LanguageData.VFE_Plinth.description: A small plinth with an artistic imagery carved into the sides. Can be used for storing miscellaneous items. Items stored in this will not deteriorate, even if outside.
LanguageData.VFE_Plinth_Blueprint_Install.label: plinth (blueprint)
LanguageData.VFE_DecorativePlantPot.label: декоративний горщик
LanguageData.VFE_DecorativePlantPot.description: Plant decorative flowers on this ornamental plant pot to improve the mood of people nearby.
LanguageData.VFE_Wallpaper.label: шпалери
LanguageData.VFE_Wallpaper.description: An impassable wall with a beautiful wallpaper. Capable of holding up a roof.
LanguageData.VFE_Wallpaper_Blueprint.label: wallpaper (blueprint)
LanguageData.VFE_Wallpaper_Frame.label: wallpaper (building)
LanguageData.VFE_Wallpaper_Frame.description: An impassable wall with a beautiful wallpaper. Capable of holding up a roof.
